about_the_game:
The Bridge Curse: Road to Salvation is a stealth-based atmospheric horror game based on true urban legend.
Out of 10 college horror tales from Taiwan, The Bridge Curse is one of the well-known supernatural incidents based in Tunghu University.
Players will immersively wander on campus and experience the campus horror from the first-person perspective.
Backstory: Taboo from bygone days that alive for many years in Tunghu University.
A lingering female ghost has been long-lived on the campus bridge for several decades.
Six college kids challenged the urban legend and accidentally came across the terrifying curse.
Who will survive and how the curse is fixed yet remains unknown.
Gameplay: Observe your surrounding environment and figure out the best route for evacuating.
Complete the exploration before the female ghost murder you.
Mastering your stealth skill is the only way to survive in the dark.
Believe in yourself and try to piece all the information together to break the curse and find the true backstory.

Key Feature


Escape from Ghost
Master your stealth skills to avoid the female ghost’s trailing.



Campus Exploration
Discover the terrifying backstory by collecting key items and area investigation.



Mystery Puzzles
Break the curse by puzzling gatherable items and information.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

short_description: Fear, anxiety, and laughter are the symbol of youth. Experience the true paranormal haunting with your friends from the first-person perspective and stay alive. The Bridge Curse: Road to Salvation is an adaptation of a horror film, includes Taiwanese urban legend and an intriguing backstory.
